title: Understanding Inhalants
text: Inhalants are substances that people typically inhale to achieve a quick high. They are often found in household products.

title: Common Household Inhalants
text: Think about products that are commonly used in homes and can be inhaled for a quick high.

hintAnswer: spray paints, markers, glue, gasoline, and cleaning fluids
title: Identifying Inhalants
text: Which of the following are commonly misused as inhalants?
choices: spray paints, markers, glue, gasoline, and cleaning fluids
no currently accepted medical use and a high potential for abuse
no potential for abuse, with use potentially leading to severe psychological or physical dependence
